factsheet.heading: Firepit Collective
paragraphs: Firepit is an artist run collective. We have seven resident artists in the building, numerous associate artists and two charity partners. The collectives purpose is to create a safe inclusive space for artists to work and for people to visit. We hold workshops and events in the space as well as showcasing Firepit artists' work in a permanently setup gallery space. We work closely within the local community, developing ideas alongside the people that live and work here.

factsheet.heading: Exhibitions and Artists
paragraphs:
Some of the subject matters of the artwork we are displaying include, reflecting hidden illnesses, the human journey connected to mental health, highlighting the hidden stories of key workers within our community, emotional and metaphysical storytelling, feminine expression & sensuality, breaking down barriers of prejudice and stereotype, use of natural sustainable materials and various community led projects. This comes in the form of Abstracts, Mixed Media, Photography, Sculpture and more.
